thread.title: Pentagon disinvites China from major U.S. military exercise

title: Pentagon disinvites China from major U.S. military exercise
text:
Pentagon disinvites China from major U.S. military exercise 12:58am BST - 01:21
The Pentagon on Wednesday disinvited China from a major U.S.-hosted naval drill in response to what it sees as Beijing's militarization of islands in the South China Sea, a decision China's top diplomat Wang Yi called an ''unconstructive move''. Rough Cut
